page.title: 13 FARMING ENGINEERS-WEST ROW
page.content: IN A FARMING AREA SUCH AS WEST ROW IT IS NO SURPRISE TO FIND A LOCAL FIRM SPECIALISING IN AGRICULTURAL ENGINEER- ING. W.J.FORD & SONS IS AN OLD FAMILY BUSINESS WHICH HAS SERVED THE FARMING COMMUNITY HERE FOR MANY YEARS. THE PRESENT OWNER CAN REMEMBER THE TIMES WHEN MOST FARMERS SENT ALL THEIR REPAIRS TO THE FIRM. NOWADAYS THE FARMERS THEMSELVES CAN COPE WITH THE MAJORITY OF THE PROBLEMS THAT CROP UP OR THEY CAN CONTACT THE MAIN DEALERS. THIS LEAVES ONLY A SMALL AMOUNT OF WORK FOR THE LOCAL ENGINEER - OFTEN DIFFICULT JOBS THAT THE FARMER DOES NOT WANT TO DO. TO COMBAT THIS DECLINE IN BUSINESS THE FIRM UNDERTAKES OTHER WORK, NOTABLY FOR THE COUNCIL, THE AMERICAN AUTHORITIES AND LOCAL BUILDERS.
